titles.title: Unemployment Tax Repeal Act of 2005
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the inclusion in gross income of unemployment compensation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 12/16/2005--Introduced. Unemployment Tax Repeal Act of 2005 - Repeals the Internal Revenue Code provision requiring the inclusion of unemployment compensation in gross income.
